name: Standoff Simulator
description:
Standoff Simulator

Shoot your opponent before he shoots you! 

Steps to shoot:

1. Grab Gun

2. Aim Gun

3. Cock the hammer - this step is optional but will allow you to fire much quicker, if attempting to fire without cocking the hammer, there will be a slight delay before shooting

4. Fire!

Starting from difficulty setting "COWBOY", the order of the displayed input keys will be randomized, good luck!
